summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 26, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 4, being the alley between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99060 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
